title: The PC suite cannot start automatically after the installation.
answer:
(1)Check whether the shortcut icon of the PC suite is displayed on the desktop or in the notification area. If yes, double-click the icon to start the management program.
(2)Ensure that the WiMAX Stick is correctly connected to the PC, do as follows:
a.Uninstall the PC suite.
b.Remove the WiMAX Stick from the PC after uninstallation, and then connect the WiMAX Stick to the PC again.
c.Install the PC suite again according to the prompts.
(3)Remove the WiMAX Stick safely and restart the PC. Then connect the WiMAX Stick to the PC again.
(4)Ensure that the auto-play function of the OS is enabled.
